title: Teapot
provenance: Gift of the Estate of Edgar Sachs, from the Collection of Hilda G. and Edgar Sachs
description: Pear-shaped tea pot with domed lid;  white ground with polychrome decoration of stylized figurative scene of a man on horseback in red, green, blue, purple, and yellow on a white ground.
name: Teapot
